dc_title_s: 1930 Real Estate Plat-Book of the City of Trenton and Borough of Princeton, Mercer County, New Jersey (Index Page, Princeton)
dc_description_s: In addition to the title page, the 1930 Plat-Book contains three indices and 48 detailed map plates of the city of Trenton, and 6 detailed map plates and one page containing three indices for the borough of Princeton.|This plate contains the three indices for the borough of Princeton. A color Index map delineating the 6 sections of the borough with each section lettered (A-F) to reference its corresponding plate within the Plat-Book.|There is also a key explaining building construction, building types, transportation systems, public institutions, parks, cemeteries, etc.|The second index is an alphabetical listing of street names referenced to their corresponding plate letters.|The third index is of Borough Atlas Plate (B.A.P.) numbers referenced to the corresponding lettered plates.
